nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith Vol. 1 — Imperial Machine

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith Vol. 1 — Imperial Machine is a canon trade paperback that collects the first six issues of the comic-book series Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith from author Charles Soule, as well as the comic story "No Good Deed..." from authors Chris Eliopoulos and Jordie Bellaire. It was published by Marvel Comics on December 5, 2017.

From acclaimed writer Charles Soule comes a brand-new, exhilarating series exploring Darth Vader's early history. Picking up directly where Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith ends, follow Vader as he receives his legendary red lightsaber and witness Vader's rise to power as a Dark Lord of the Sith!
